QuestData.Title: Cho's Missive
QuestData.Description:
One of those adorable little grummles came by and said that Lorewalker Cho sent for you. You should meet up with him!
The grummel said he's at Onekeg, to the north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at Onekeg in Kun-Lai Summit.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, hello. Nice to see you again.
